com.sap.spc.product

Interface IProductUnits

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public interface IProductUnits
extends java.io.Serializable
    Interface for accessing the unit data of a product.

      • addUnitEntry

        void addUnitEntry(java.lang.String unit,
                  int numerator,
                  int denominator,
                  int exponent10,
                  java.math.BigDecimal grossWeight,
                  java.math.BigDecimal netWeight,
                  java.lang.String weightUnit,
                  java.math.BigDecimal volume,
                  java.lang.String volumeUnit,
                  boolean isBaseUnit)
           throws ConversionMissingDataException
        Adds a new unit entry to the product
        Parameters:
        conversionEngine - the engine used to convert the new unit to the base unit
        unit - the name of the new unit
        numerator - conversion to base unit numerator
        denominator - conversion to base unit denominator
        exponent10 - conversion to base unit exponent10
        grossWeight - gross weight in relation to the new unit
        netWeight - net weight in relation to the new unit
        weightUnit - the weight unit
        volume - volume in relation to the new unit
        volumeUnit - the volume unit
        isBaseUnit - indicator whether the new unit is base unit if the product
        Throws:
        ConversionInconsistentDBException - if the unit of measure is not found in the database
        ConversionMissingDataException

      • getBaseUOM

        java.lang.String getBaseUOM()
        Returns:
        the name base unit of measure.
